p: A study carried out by Geethalakshmi et al. [ 39] projects a reduction in the yields of the same rice variety ADT 43 by 356 kg ha –1 decade –1 for PRECIS model output, whereas the decline was 217 kg ha –1 decade -1 for the RegCM3 output over the Cauvery Delta Zone simulated by the DSSAT without considering the CO 2 fertilization. However, when the CO 2 fertilization effect was considered, the PRECIS output showed a decreasing trend, whereas the RegCM3 projected an increased yield.
